name: Sopwith Camel
description:
The Sopwith Camel Scout was a World War I British single-seat fighter.

A 2D game based on Sopwith, developed by David L. Clark for DOS computers in the 1980s.
The goal of the game is to fly an airplane, air combat, and destroy enemy targets. The game consists of 3 levels, differing in the difficulty of passing.
Genre - arcade flight simulator.
The mode is single-user.
OS - Windows 10 , Windows 7.
The resolution is fixed at 1200x900.

Developed on AutoHotkey.
